summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a real estate transaction involving a property in Bradford. The buyer, Steve Marshal, is seeking assistance with title examination and related legal questions, aiming for a quick closing. The email discusses the buyer's concerns about easements, hunting rights, and potential nearby construction.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is the buyer seeking assistance with the title examination and legal questions regarding a property purchase in Bradford.

persons.name: Jen
persons.context: Jen is mentioned as having provided details about the transaction to Steve Marshal.

connections.description: Steve Marshal connected with Jen for details regarding his property transaction.

events.title: Real Estate Transaction Inquiry
events.description: Steve Marshal inquires about assistance with a title search and legal questions for a property purchase in Bradford.

keyFacts: Steve Marshal is looking to purchase a property for $1,075,000 and wants to close quickly.
The buyer has concerns about easements, hunting rights, and potential nearby construction.
The email discusses the need for a title examination and due diligence regarding the property.
The closing date is tentatively set for December 13/14, 2019.
There is mention of a potential nuclear power plant construction in the vicinity.
